meanings.definition: The office or term of office of a doge.
meanings.sent1: The dogeships were passed down through generations in the noble family.
meanings.sent2: The dogeships of Venice were highly esteemed positions of power.
meanings.sent3: The dogeships were so prestigious that even the neighboring kingdoms admired them.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of dogeships, he was the undisputed ruler of the seas.
meanings.sent5: The grandeur of the dogeships was unmatched in all the land.

meanings.definition: The authority or jurisdiction of a doge.
meanings.sent1: The dogeships allowed him to make important decisions for the city.
meanings.sent2: The dogeships extended to matters of trade and diplomacy.
meanings.sent3: With his dogeships, he could command the fleets to sail to distant lands.
meanings.sent4: His dogeships were like a shield protecting the city from harm.
meanings.sent5: The dogeships granted him the power to shape the future of the republic.

meanings.definition: The dignity or position of a doge.
meanings.sent1: He carried himself with the grace befitting his dogeships.
meanings.sent2: The dogeships demanded respect from all who entered the palace.
meanings.sent3: Even in casual attire, his dogeships shone through.
meanings.sent4: The weight of his dogeships rested heavily on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The splendor of his dogeships was evident in every gesture he made.
